title: Introduction to JavaScript
description: This note covers the basics of JavaScript including variables, data types, and control structures. It's the foundation for all upcoming lessons.

title: DOM Manipulation Deep Dive
description: Detailed explanation of how to select, modify, and remove elements using DOM methods. Includes real-world examples and edge cases.

title: Working with Arrays
description: Explores various array methods including map, filter, reduce, and forEach with practical use-cases and performance insights.

title: CSS Flexbox Layouts
description: Understanding Flexbox: from containers and items to alignment and spacing. Useful for responsive UI designs.

title: ES6 Features Overview
description: Brief overview of ES6 features like arrow functions, destructuring, template literals, and default parameters.

title: Promises and Async/Await
description: A breakdown of asynchronous JavaScript patterns. Includes real-life examples and error handling strategies.

title: Setting Up a React App
description: Step-by-step guide on how to create a React project using Vite or Create React App, including directory structure and initial config.

title: Understanding useState and useEffect
description: This note dives into the most commonly used React hooks with hands-on examples and lifecycle comparison.

title: State Management with Redux
description: Learn the principles of Redux, action creators, reducers, and middleware through a simple counter app.

title: Responsive Design Principles
description: Best practices for mobile-first design, breakpoints, and accessibility tips to build user-friendly web interfaces.

title: Git Basics and Workflow
description: Explains the basic Git commands, branching strategies, and how to collaborate efficiently on GitHub.

title: Forms in React
description: Guide on handling controlled and uncontrolled components, form validations, and submission handling.

title: Using APIs with Fetch
description: Covers the basics of sending HTTP requests using fetch, handling responses, and managing errors.

title: Authentication in Web Apps
description: An introduction to login systems, token-based authentication, and using tools like JWT.

title: Creating Dynamic Routes in React Router
description: Learn how to use `useParams`, dynamic routes, and nested routes effectively in your SPA.

title: Debugging JavaScript
description: Tips and tools for debugging JS code using console logs, browser dev tools, and linters.

title: Deploying to Netlify
description: Walkthrough for deploying static websites to Netlify, configuring environment variables, and troubleshooting.

title: React Context API
description: Understand the Context API for state sharing without props drilling, with practical examples.

title: Styling with Tailwind CSS
description: Intro to utility-first CSS using Tailwind. Covers installation, setup, and usage in React.

title: Performance Optimization Tips
description:

### ğŸ›  API Endpoints

#### GET `/api/stats`

Fetches user stats.

```json
{
  "users": 1278,
  "active": 963
}
```

#### POST `/api/feedback`

Submit user feedback.

```json
{
  "message": "Great experience!",
  "rating": 5
}
```
